article_title: Pope Benedict makes appearance at Vatican event for the elderly
article_text: - Former pope Benedict arrived for a gathering of elderly people in St. Peter's Square Sunday morning. This is the third time the former pontiff, 87, has made a public appearance since his resignation in February 2013. ()

- Former pope Benedict arrived for a gathering of elderly people in St. Peter's Square Sunday morning.
This is the third time the former pontiff, 87, has made a public appearance since his resignation in February 2013.
